name: Halloweenie Cleanup REDUX
description: An old update to an even older theme that I did for myself last year. This is my favorite halloween theme so I decided to share it so everyone else can still use it too. Original theme credited to lollipopzombie, while the original cleanup/update is credited to hideheader. Goes great with the Pumpkin Shaped Avatars by alycat. Fullsize screenshot available here.
